description: Demonstrates all arithmetic operators on two integers
instruction:
How to Run:
Save: File name must match the Class Name (e.g., ArithmeticOperatorsDemo.java).
Compile: javac ArithmeticOperatorsDemo.java
Run: java ArithmeticOperatorsDemo

description: Shows integer division vs double division using casting
instruction:
How to Run:
Save: File name must match the Class Name (e.g., ArithmeticDoubleDivision.java).
Compile: javac ArithmeticDoubleDivision.java
Run: java ArithmeticDoubleDivision

How to Run:
Save: File name must match the Class Name (e.g., UnaryIncDecBasic.java).
Compile: javac UnaryIncDecBasic.java
Run: java UnaryIncDecBasic

How to Run:
Save: File name must match the Class Name (e.g., PrePostIncrement.java).
Compile: javac PrePostIncrement.java
Run: java PrePostIncrement
output:
a = 5
Post-Increment (a++): 5
After Post-Increment a = 6

b = 5
Pre-Increment (++b): 6
After Pre-Increment b = 6

instruction:
How to Run:
Save: File name must match the Class Name (e.g., PrePostDecrement.java).
Compile: javac PrePostDecrement.java
Run: java PrePostDecrement
output:
a = 8
Post-Decrement (a--): 8
After Post-Decrement a = 7

b = 8
Pre-Decrement (--b): 7
After Pre-Decrement b = 7

description: Demonstrates different assignment operators in Java
instruction:
How to Run:
Save: File name must match the Class Name (e.g., AssignmentOperatorsDemo.java).
Compile: javac AssignmentOperatorsDemo.java
Run: java AssignmentOperatorsDemo

description: Demonstrates relational operators and their boolean results
instruction:
How to Run:
Save: File name must match the Class Name (e.g., RelationalOperatorsDemo.java).
Compile: javac RelationalOperatorsDemo.java
Run: java RelationalOperatorsDemo
output:
a > b : false
a < b : true
a >= b : false
a <= b : true
a == b : false
a != b : true

description: Demonstrates logical AND, OR, and NOT operators
instruction:
How to Run:
Save: File name must match the Class Name (e.g., LogicalOperatorsDemo.java).
Compile: javac LogicalOperatorsDemo.java
Run: java LogicalOperatorsDemo
output:
Eligible (age>=18 && hasID): true
Eligible (age>=18 || hasID): true
NOT hasID (!hasID): false

description: Shows short-circuit behavior where second condition may not execute
instruction:
How to Run:
Save: File name must match the Class Name (e.g., ShortCircuitDemo.java).
Compile: javac ShortCircuitDemo.java
Run: java ShortCircuitDemo

Run: java BitwiseOperatorsDemo

instruction:

description: Shows how Java follows operator precedence in expressions
instruction:
How to Run:
Save: File name must match the Class Name (e.g., OperatorPrecedence.java).

description: Demonstrates how + operator works for string concatenation
instruction:
How to Run:
Save: File name must match the Class Name (e.g., StringConcatenationDemo.java).

Run: java StringConcatenationDemo

description: Swaps two numbers without using temp variable using XOR operator
instruction:
How to Run:
Save: File name must match the Class Name (e.g., XorSwap.java).
Compile: javac XorSwap.java
Run: java XorSwap
output:
Before Swap: a = 10, b = 20
After Swap: a = 20, b = 10
